title: Paragon Playground & Kiddy Rides on Level 5
blurb: Fun for children at our playground and kiddy rides!
description: Let the children have some fun at our playground and kiddy rides on Level 5 while you take a break from shopping. The playground offers a safe and engaging environment for kids to play and explore. Kiddy rides provide entertainment for younger children. It's a perfect spot for families to relax and enjoy their time at Paragon. The area is designed to be family-friendly, ensuring a pleasant experience for both parents and children. Enjoy a variety of rides and play structures suitable for different age groups.
